channel.title: Extremehostonline
channel.description:
Welcome to the the best hosting company in Hosting History! The link is: http://extremehostonline.com/
The hosting company offers:
[b]Bronze Package:[/b] Start from $7.95 per year
* 450 MB disk space * 100 GB bandwidth * Only $7.95 Per Year
[b]Silver Package:[/b] Start from $13.95 per year
* 2 GB disk space * 350 GB bandwidth * Only $13.95 Per Year
[b]Unlimited Package:[/b] Start from $26.75 per year
* Unlimited GB Disk Space * Unlimited GB Bandwidth * Only $27.95 Per Year
If you wish to contact The owner of ExtremehostOnline please contact: Webmaster@extremehostonline.com
Thank you for reading
Proof: [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/bdm5xc.jpg[/img]

item.title: Extremehostonline
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

im assuming OP is the owner of the site and kill4realz7 is also OP so here is something you should look at.

@site
on the main page the plans are called ‘bronze, silver and unlimited’ then in the plans page you have ‘bronze, silver and gold’, there are spelling mistakes on your plans page, no information about the servers that the customers are hosted on, The plans have not been thought out at all (take a look at what you offer in each plan for each price.) You should add a buy button on the plans page and you failed at adding the order form into the template.

You should have done research looked at other leading web hosting companys and made sure everything was perfect before launching the site.

Read full topic
